description:
go.crypto/ssh/terminal: don't save passwords in history.

The history buffer would recall previously entered lines: including passwords. With this change, lines entered while echo is disabled are no longer put into the history.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.crypto/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=06b2614538ce&repo=crypto ***

go.crypto/ssh/terminal: don't save passwords in history.

The history buffer would recall previously entered lines: including passwords. With this change, lines entered while echo is disabled are no longer put into the history.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10853043

subject: code review 10853043: go.crypto/ssh/terminal: don't save passwords in history.
